title: J's Purple Scarf
description: We've all been there; sick ofcooking the same thing night after night. Well Travis needs a reason tobreak-out of the dinner doldrums and an impending promotion for his wife isjust the excuse he needs. Come along for the ride as the sexy couple checks outa cooking class, but be careful, once you get inside Travis's car, you mightnot want to get out.
author: Ryan O'Leary
